name: LinkQuoter
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description. If you enjoy my work, please consider donating on [Buy Me a Coffee](<https://www.buymeacoffee.com/aaa3a>) or [Ko-Fi](<https://ko-fi.com/aaa3a>)!
If you previously used Phen's cog, please run `[p]setlinkquoter migratefromphen`.
short: Quote any Discord message from its link!
description: Quote any Discord message from its link!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
